settings.label: Show?
settings.info: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Menu Type
settings.info: Show submenu by. This field is applicable only for top-level menu.

settings.label: Static Width
settings.info: The width of the static width megamenu popup. eg: 600px

settings.label: Float
settings.info: This field is applicable only for top-level categories.

settings.label: Font Icon Class
settings.info: If this category has no "Icon Image", font icon will be shown. example to input: icon-dollar

settings.label: Menu Column
settings.info: This field is applicable only for top-level menu.

settings.label: Proportions: Block Left
settings.info: This field is applicable only for top-level menu.

settings.label: Allow customers to share their wishlist via email?
Google Map Api Key
settings.info: You can get an API key from https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key. eg: AIzaSyCkw3Q5Y7y2prqgTXSvF50Nr09-j7_carc. This is an example key for localhost.

settings.label: Address
settings.info: Enter the address that you would like to show on the map here, i.e. "Cupertino".

settings.label: Latitude Coodinate
settings.info: Enter the Latitude coordinate of the location marker.

settings.label: Longitude Coodinate
settings.info: Enter the Longitude coordinate of the location marker.

settings.label: Enable Lazy Loading Effect on PC?
Enable Lazy Loading Effect on Mobile Devices?
MailChimp Form Action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)

settings.label: Description newsleter:
settings.default: Sign up for email and never miss the latest products, news, events, promotion and many more.

settings.label: Custom Style 1
settings.info: Type in your custom styles , e.g.: .page { padding: 0; margin: 0; } .main { font-size: 14px; font-weight:400; }

settings.label: Custom Style 2
settings.info: Type in your custom styles , e.g.: .page { padding: 0; margin: 0; } .main { font-size: 14px; font-weight:400; }

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping  calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .
